name: Safari Express: Animal Train
description:
What is more exciting than driving a train? What is more exciting than visiting a safari? What if I tell you can do both in this amazing safari train driving simulator?
In this train driving simulator you can drive your train along the safari tracks and enjoy the magic of the nature, but of course, we thought there should be some dangers stalking you. What could be funnier than running against animals? You know, no pain, no gain. This is why you will face rhinoceroses in this locomotive game. Enjoy the nature of the majestic animals and drive through their habitats.

There is nothing better than animals running free in the wildness. Now you have the chance to live the experience of see them, but be careful, the rhino is a very territorial animal, it does not want intruders in the wild life. Rhinos will try to avoid you to go on with your field trip. Do not let them to stop you!

- Be the driver of your own train in this simulator game.
- Face the rhino as it approaches, look the danger directly into the eyes.
- Avoid to crash against them.
- Reach the checkpoints and increase your speed.
- Do not forget to share your achievements with your friends!

Now choose your favorite train and run free through the desert to prove humans and animals can live together in perfect harmony! Play now this amazing driving simulator game!
